alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:59PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madera, south central Merced and west central Fresno Counties through 730 PM PDT... At 659 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Dos Palos, or 29 miles southwest of Merced, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Firebaugh, South Dos Palos, Dos Palos and Panoche Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198
